content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 0, Manchester City 2.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 0, Manchester City 2.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Joe Allen.
Attempt blocked. Konstantinos Stafylidis (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Joe Allen.
Substitution, Manchester City. Ilkay Gündogan replaces Gabriel Jesus.
Foul by Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City).
Bruno Martins Indi (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Stoke City. Ramadan Sobhi replaces Geoff Cameron.
Offside, Manchester City. Kevin De Bruyne tries a through ball, but Gabriel Jesus is caught offside.
Corner,  Stoke City. Conceded by Fernandinho.
Substitution, Manchester City. Bernardo Silva replaces Raheem Sterling.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Attempt missed. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a cross.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Badou Ndiaye.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Konstantinos Stafylidis (Stoke City) because of an injury.
Delay in match Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) because of an injury.

Geoff Cameron (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Kurt Zouma (Stoke City) because of an injury.

Attempt missed. Bruno Martins Indi (Stoke City) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Substitution, Stoke City. Peter Crouch replaces Jesé.

Attempt saved. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by David Silva.

Attempt missed. Fernandinho (Manchester City) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a through ball following a fast break.
Offside, Manchester City. Raheem Sterling tries a through ball, but Gabriel Jesus is caught offside.
Goal!  Stoke City 0, Manchester City 2. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Gabriel Jesus.
